name: File of Dark
description:
Oh no! You forgot your files inside the school you work at...You went inside the school but realized it's already dark...It shouldn't be that hard right?

Controls:

Shift - Run

E - collect files

F - hide

Tutorial:

- Find 7 files and collect them afterwards go back to the entrance (the place you started) to escape

-When you hear a breathing like sound try to find any places to hide like lockers


Developer's Note:

Hi guys! I have made this game but sadly this game will be not be continued any longer so my apologies for any bugs present in this game. Anyways I hope you guys have fun with this game I made.
